title: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana 2025
description: Financial assistance of ₹6000 per year to small and marginal farmers across India. Direct benefit transfer to farmers' bank accounts in three equal installments.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with landholding up to 2 hectares. Must have valid Aadhaar card and bank account.

details.importantDates:
Scheme Launch: 01 February 2019
Application Start: 01 January 2025
Last Date: 31 March 2025
Next Installment: 15 April 2025
details.applicationFee:
Application Fee: Free
No charges for registration
Online application only
details.ageLimit:
No age limit
Applicable for all farmers
Landholding criteria applies
details.totalPosts:
Target Beneficiaries: 12 Crore Farmers
Coverage: Pan India
All states and UTs included
details.eligibilityDetails: Small and marginal farmers with cultivable landholding up to 2 hectares. Must have valid Aadhaar card linked to bank account. Land records should be updated.
details.salaryPerks:
Financial Assistance: ₹6,000 per year
Payment Mode: Direct Bank Transfer
Installments: 3 equal installments of ₹2,000 each
Payment Schedule: April, August, December
details.selectionProcess:
Online Registration
Document Verification
Land Record Verification
Bank Account Verification
Approval by District Collector
details.howTo:
Visit pmkisan.gov.in
Click on 'New Farmer Registration'
Enter Aadhaar Number
Fill farmer details
Upload documents: Aadhaar, Bank Passbook, Land Records
Submit application
Note down registration number

title: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
description: World's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage of ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
eligibility: Families identified through Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) 2011. Rural and urban poor families are eligible.

details.importantDates:
Scheme Launch: 23 September 2018
Enrollment: Ongoing
Card Generation: Immediate
Coverage: Lifetime
details.applicationFee:
Registration Fee: Free
Card Generation: Free
No premium payment required
details.ageLimit:
No age limit
Family-based coverage
All family members included
details.totalPosts:
Target Beneficiaries: 50 Crore People
Coverage: 10.74 Crore Families
Hospitals: 25,000+ empanelled
details.eligibilityDetails: Families identified in SECC 2011 database. Rural families with specific deprivation criteria. Urban families in occupational categories like rag pickers, domestic workers, etc.
details.salaryPerks:
Health Coverage: ₹5,00,000 per family per year
Cashless Treatment: At empanelled hospitals
Pre and Post Hospitalization: Covered
Transportation Allowance: As per norms
details.selectionProcess:
Automatic Eligibility Check
Aadhaar Authentication
Biometric Verification
Card Generation
Hospital Empanelment
details.howTo:
Visit nearest Common Service Center
Carry Aadhaar card and family details
Verify eligibility online at pmjay.gov.in
Generate Ayushman card
Use card at empanelled hospitals
No cash payment required for covered treatments

title: PM Awas Yojana (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana)
organization: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
description: Housing for All mission providing financial assistance for construction/purchase of houses for economically weaker sections and low-income groups.
eligibility: EWS, LIG, and MIG families who do not own a pucca house. Annual income criteria as per category.

details.importantDates:
Scheme Launch: 25 June 2015
Application Start: 01 January 2025
Last Date: 30 June 2025
Completion Target: 31 March 2026
details.applicationFee:
Application Fee: ₹25
Processing Fee: As applicable
Payment Mode: Online
details.ageLimit:
Adult member of family
No specific age limit
Family income criteria applies
details.totalPosts:
Target Houses: 1 Crore Houses
Urban Mission: Ongoing
Rural Mission: Parallel scheme
details.eligibilityDetails: EWS: Annual income up to ₹3 lakh. LIG: Annual income ₹3-6 lakh. MIG-I: Annual income ₹6-12 lakh. MIG-II: Annual income ₹12-18 lakh. Should not own pucca house.
details.salaryPerks:
Credit Linked Subsidy: Up to ₹2.67 lakh
Interest Subsidy: 6.5% for EWS/LIG
Loan Amount: Up to ₹12 lakh for MIG-II
Carpet Area: 30-160 sq.m as per category
details.selectionProcess:
Online Application
Document Verification
Technical Sanction
Bank Loan Processing
Subsidy Credit
Construction Monitoring
details.howTo:
Visit pmaymis.gov.in
Click 'Citizen Assessment'
Fill online application
Upload documents: Aadhaar, Income Certificate, Property Documents
Pay application fee
Submit to ULB
Track application status online

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana 2025
description: Small savings scheme for girl child education and marriage expenses. Tax benefits under Section 80C with attractive interest rates.
eligibility: Girl child below 10 years of age. Indian resident. One account per girl child. Maximum 2 accounts per family.

details.importantDates:
Scheme Launch: 22 January 2015
Account Opening: Ongoing
Maturity Period: 21 years
Deposit Period: 15 years
details.applicationFee:
Account Opening: Free
Minimum Deposit: ₹250 per year
Maximum Deposit: ₹1.5 lakh per year
details.ageLimit:
Girl Child Age: Below 10 years
Account Opening: Until 10th birthday
Maturity: At age 21 years
details.totalPosts:
Target: All eligible girl children
Coverage: Pan India
Banks: All authorized banks and post offices
details.eligibilityDetails: Girl child below 10 years of age at the time of account opening. Indian resident. Birth certificate required. Maximum 2 accounts per family (for 2 girl children).
details.salaryPerks:
Interest Rate: 8.2% per annum (compounded annually)
Tax Benefit: Under Section 80C up to ₹1.5 lakh
Tax Free: Interest and maturity amount
Partial Withdrawal: 50% after 18 years for higher education
details.selectionProcess:
Visit Bank/Post Office
Fill Account Opening Form
Submit Required Documents
Initial Deposit
Account Activation
Regular Deposits
details.howTo:
Visit nearest bank or post office
Carry documents: Birth Certificate, Aadhaar of girl child and parents, Address proof
Fill account opening form
Make initial deposit (minimum ₹250)
Receive passbook
Continue annual deposits for 15 years

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Micro-finance scheme providing loans up to ₹10 lakh to small businesses and entrepreneurs without collateral.
eligibility: Small business owners, entrepreneurs, self-employed individuals. No collateral required. Good credit history preferred.

details.importantDates:
Scheme Launch: 08 April 2015
Application: Ongoing throughout year
Loan Disbursement: Within 30 days
Repayment: Up to 5 years
details.applicationFee:
Application Fee: Free
Processing Fee: As per bank norms
No collateral required
details.ageLimit:
Minimum Age: 18 years
Maximum Age: 65 years
Business experience preferred
details.totalPosts:
Target: All eligible entrepreneurs
Loan Categories: Shishu, Kishore, Tarun
Banks: All scheduled commercial banks
details.eligibilityDetails: Small business owners, entrepreneurs, shopkeepers, vendors, artisans, food service units. Should have business plan. No collateral required for loans up to ₹10 lakh.
details.salaryPerks:
Shishu: Up to ₹50,000
Kishore: ₹50,001 to ₹5,00,000
Tarun: ₹5,00,001 to ₹10,00,000
Interest Rate: As per bank policy
Repayment: Flexible tenure up to 5 years
details.selectionProcess:
Business Plan Preparation
Bank Application
Document Verification
Credit Assessment
Loan Sanction
Disbursement
details.howTo:
Visit nearest bank branch
Carry documents: Aadhaar, PAN, Business proof, Address proof
Fill loan application form
Submit business plan
Complete KYC process
Loan processing and approval
Receive loan amount in bank account
